de.humatic.jdl
Class DecklinkIOControl

java.lang.Object
  de.humatic.jdl.DecklinkInterface
      de.humatic.jdl.DecklinkIOControl

public class DecklinkIOControl
extends DecklinkInterface

IDecklinkIOControl implementation, this interface is exposed by all Decklink filters.

Method Summary
 int getIOFeatures()
          Get the IO features of a DeckLink card.
 void setAFrameReference(int tcFrameNumber)
          Sets the A-frame reference for 3:2 pulldown removal to the given timecode frame number.
 void setAnalogueOutput(int out, int flags)
          Selects component, composite or S-Video out.
flags:
setupIs75 - 1, componentLevelsSMPTE - 2
 void setAudioInputSource(int src)
          Selects between AES/EBU (1) and Decklink (0) audio input.
In Decklink mode the source of audio will depend upon the selected source of video.
If the video input is SDI, the embedded audio is used, if the video input is analogue then analogue audio will be used.
 void setBlackToDeckInCapture(int mode)
          Sets channel black output when capturing:
0 - NONE Disable black output
1 - DIGITAL Output stable black video on SDI video output
2 - ANALOGUE
 void setCaptureTimecodeSource(int src)
          Selects timecode source.
 void setCaptureVANCLines(int vancLine1, int vancLine2, int vancLine3)
          Sets the VANC lines to be captured into the active picture.
 void setDualLinkOutput(boolean enabled)
           
 void setGenlockTiming(int offset)
          Adjusts the timing offset of the genlock input.
 void setHDTVPulldownOnOutput(int on)
          Enables (1) or disables (0) the 3:2 pulldown mode for HD23.976 video :
 void setSingleFieldOutputForSynchronousFrames(boolean enabled)
           
 void setVideoInput(int in, int flags)
          Select between SDI, component, composite, S-Video or HDMI (0 - 4) video input.
flags:
setupIs75 - 1, componentLevelsSMPTE - 2
 void setVideoOutputDownconversionMode2(int mode, int flags)
          Sets the hardware HD downconversion mode.
0 - Disable hardware downconversion.
1 - LB16X9, Enable hardware downconversion, output will be SD 16:9 letter box.
2 - ANA, Enable hardware downconversion, output will be SD anamorphic.
3 - CENTER, Enable hardware downconversion, output will be SD center cut
%flags determines whether downconversion will be done to analog outputs (bit 1 set - true, not set - false)

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

getIOFeatures

public int getIOFeatures()
Get the IO features of a DeckLink card. Bits representing supported features (see IOF_ constants) will be set in returned int.

                       throws de.humatic.dsj.DSJException

flags:
setupIs75 - 1, componentLevelsSMPTE - 2

flags:

Throws:

setAudioInputSource

public void setAudioInputSource(int src)
                         throws de.humatic.dsj.DSJException
Selects between AES/EBU (1) and Decklink (0) audio input.
In Decklink mode the source of audio will depend upon the selected source of video.
If the video input is SDI, the embedded audio is used, if the video input is analogue then analogue audio will be used.

Throws:
de.humatic.dsj.DSJException

setHDTVPulldownOnOutput

public void setHDTVPulldownOnOutput(int on)
                             throws de.humatic.dsj.DSJException
Enables (1) or disables (0) the 3:2 pulldown mode for HD23.976 video :

Throws:
de.humatic.dsj.DSJException

setVideoOutputDownconversionMode2

public void setVideoOutputDownconversionMode2(int mode,
                                              int flags)
                                       throws de.humatic.dsj.DSJException
Sets the hardware HD downconversion mode.
0 - Disable hardware downconversion.
1 - LB16X9, Enable hardware downconversion, output will be SD 16:9 letter box.
2 - ANA, Enable hardware downconversion, output will be SD anamorphic.
3 - CENTER, Enable hardware downconversion, output will be SD center cut
%flags determines whether downconversion will be done to analog outputs (bit 1 set - true, not set - false)

Throws:
de.humatic.dsj.DSJException

setCaptureTimecodeSource

public void setCaptureTimecodeSource(int src)
                              throws de.humatic.dsj.DSJException
Selects timecode source. 0 - VITC (Vertical Interval Time Code) or 1 - HANC (Horizontal Ancilliary Data).

Throws:
de.humatic.dsj.DSJException
